model_utils module¶

Utility methods for QCNN training.

model_utils.choose_model(model_type: str, model_args: Dict[str, Any]) → Callable[source]¶

Picks and loads one of the implemented classifier model classes with the given hyperparmaeters.

Args
model_type (str)Model type. Currently, only the quantum classifier is

implemented.

model_args (Dict[str, Any]) : Model parameters.

Returns:

The loaded quantum classifier model with the given configuration.

Return type:

Callable

model_utils.create_state(rng: Array, model_cls: Module, input_shape: Tuple[int] | List[Tuple[int]], input_args: Dict | None = None, opt_args: Dict | None = None) → TrainState[source]¶

Function to create train state of input class

Parameters:

  • rng (PRNGKey) – Random number generator key

  • model_cls (nn.Module) – Flax class to create trainstate

  • input_shape (Tuple[int]) – Input data shape

  • input_args (Dict) – Input argument for trainstate class

  • opt_args (Dict) – Optimizer arguments

Returns:

Initial training state.

Return type:

TrainState

model_utils.init_trainstate(model_args: Tuple[Dict], opt_args: Tuple[Dict], input_shape: Tuple, key: Array) → Tuple[TrainState, Array][source]¶
model_utils.print_losses(epoch: int, epochs: int, train_loss: Dict[str, Array], valid_loss: Dict[str, Array])[source]¶

Print the training and validation losses.

Args :

epoch (int) : Current epoch epochs (int) : Total number of epohcs train_loss (dict) : Training loss valid_loss (dict) : Validation loss

model_utils.save_outputs(epoch: int, snapshot_dir: str, outputs: Dict[str, Array], labels: Array) → None[source]¶
